title: Learn Next js with hunting coder
description: Next.js is an open-source web development framework built on top of Node.js enabling React-based web applications functionalities such as server-side rendering and generating static websites. React documentation mentions Next.js among  advising it to developers as a solution when Where traditional React apps can only render their content in the client-side browser, Next.js extends this functionality to include applications rendered on the server-side.
author: anukul pandey
